mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS aniId, a.title AS title, a.poster_url AS posterUrl, a.rating AS rating, a.rating_count AS ratingCount, a.is_dub AS isDub, a.is_subtitle AS isSubtitle, a.is_exclusive AS isExclusive, a.is_new AS isNew, a.is_popular AS isPopular, a.is_completed AS isCompleted, a.status AS animeStatus, a.year AS year, a.type AS type, f.created_at AS favoritedAt FROM ani_favorites f JOIN ani_list a ON a.id = f.ani_list_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{sort} = 'title' THEN a.title END ASC, CASE WHEN #{sort} = 'popular' THEN a.is_popular END DESC, f.created_at DESC, a.id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
